Detailed Description

Provides basic methods for connection/queries on an abstract database

Definition at line 36 of file BDDConnectionInterface.php.

Returns:
- an Errors object in case of error(s)

- NULL if operation was successful

BDDConnectionInterface::isConnected (   ) 
 

Checks whether connection is opened or closed

Returns:
- true if connection is active

- false if connection is closed

Parameters:
